item.title: DigitalBridge Buyout Buzz Gains Traction – JPMorgan Flags Softbank’s Strategic Fit
item.description: JPMorgan estimates a potential acquisition value of $25 to $35 per share if a deal materializes.

item.title: Nio Stock Garners Retail Attention After Reaching 40,000 ES8 Deliveries In 100 Days After Launch
item.description: The 40,000th third-generation ES8 SUV was delivered to an owner in Zhongshan, Guangdong, CEO and co-founder William Li said in a social media post.

item.title: Why Analysts See Nvidia’s Groq Licensing Deal As A Clear Win For AI Leadership
item.description: Despite the reported $20 billion price tag, brokerages believe the deal is small relative to Nvidia's scale and long-term earnings power.
